TopicTitle: cBBp SPC Pack v0.4: Fixed Failcan RCS and added some adapter pieces. Enjoy.

Articles.Content:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/health-17439490
I like the pack! ItÂ´s great.
Wow this pack is amazing. ive been wanting someone to make a falcon 9 and you absolutely killed it! The whole thing is amazing thanks man!
haha. I just saw the first picture of the Dragon Crewed capsule. Look where they put the engines look familiar?

Just to inform everyone that the capsule doesn\'t like re entry speeds greater than 3000ms-1. It ripped the everything off my capsule whilst in the atmosphere. In the short time left the crew were not very impressed.
I recommend the Kerbylon Launch Tower for these, as I\'ve had all the failcans drift into the launch gantry.

I was playing around, flying the rocket with MechJeb and stuff, why is there so much fuel?!

I can get into Mun orbit with this amount of fuel!
before 0.15 it was not too much. I think what has happened is they changed fuel form one unit to another. like tons to Kgs or something of the sort.
You going to fix it?
That would be great. Considered that Space X Dragon recently docked with ISS, I\'d expect the demand for this pack to rise.

Is the base of your 1st stage a mulch-adatper? where you attach the 9 merlins to one piece?

If so, then the bug is actually in the adatper, you need to add one line to its config:

// keeps fuel from flowing FROM the bottom nodes (prevents stack imbalances and such)

NoCrossFeedNodeKey = bottom

Without it, only 1 of the 9 Merlins draws fuel from the tank (but all the engines still fire)

It was a new addtion in 0.15 that went undocumented, part of the partial fix for fuel issues (which didn\'t work too well, in the end)
